title: Punar Vivah - Zindagi Milegi Dobara
overview: Punar Vivah is an Indian soap opera that airs on Zee TV. It premiered on 20 February 2012 and replaced Bhagonwali-Baante Apni Taqdeer. It aired every Monday-Friday at 10:30 pm. The show completed one year of run on 20 February 2013 and 300 episodes on 12 April 2013.
